original_text: Then Herod felt sad. But he had made a special promise to the girl, and his visitors had heard him. So he sent his men to do what she had asked for.
korean_text: 왕이 근심하나 자기가 맹세한 것과 그 함께 앉은 사람들 때문에 주라 명하고

sentences.original_text: But he had made a special promise to the girl,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그는 그 소녀에게 특별한 약속을 했었고,

sentences.original_text: and his visitors had heard him.
to do what she had asked for.
